ARABIC: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'It may well be that some of what you are anxious to hasten is right on your heels.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Perhaps some of what you wish to hasten is right behind you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: "The chastisement whose hastening you have been asking for, maybe a part of it has drawn quite near to you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Perhaps some of the things which you wish to experience immediately are very close to you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “It could be that a part of what you are impatient for is (already) after you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Perhaps that which you wish to hasten on, may be close behind you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Maybe there may have drawn near to you somewhat of that which you seek to hasten on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'It may be that riding behind you already is some part of that you seek to hasten on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: It may be that a part of that which ye would hasten on is close behind you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "It may be that a part of what you would hasten on is close behind you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: belike close behind you may be some of that which ye would hasten on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Perhaps there is right behind you some of what you seek to hasten.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "It may be that some of the events which ye wish to hasten on may be (close) in your pursuit!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "Perhaps that which you wish to hasten on, may be close behind you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'It may be that part of what you seek to hasten on is already riding behind you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Perhaps some of what you are impatient for has drawn near.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:72] Say: ‘It may be that part of what you seek to hasten on is close behind you’ — so they were slain at Badr and the remaining chastisement will come to them after death.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (It may be) and "may be" when it comes from Allah denotes necessity (that a part of that which ye would hasten on) of punishment at the Day of Badr (is close behind you) is coming soon.
